## Technical Expertise

### Languages & Frameworks
- Python (Django, Flask, FastAPI, CLI apps)  
- JavaScript / Node.js (Express, tooling, frontend integration)  
- HTML & CSS (responsive design, accessibility)  
- Shell / Bash (automation, scripting)

### DevOps & Tooling
- CI/CD: GitHub Actions, automated pipelines and release workflows  
- Containerization: Docker, docker-compose for local/staging parity  
- Testing: pytest, Jest ‚Äî automated unit and integration testing  
- Code quality: linters, formatters, static analysis, type hints where applicable  
- Databases: SQLite, PostgreSQL ‚Äî schema design and migrations

### Practices
- Test-driven development and automated regression tests  
- Secure coding and dependency vulnerability scanning  
- Emphasis on observability: logging, simple metrics, and documentation
